Scenarios.Transcript:
Maria Chen in 3E-12, 62 y/o with Stage IIIB non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), on chemoradiation. Currently
on Enoxaparin (40 mg SQ daily) and Enoxaparin (40 mg SQ daily). Most recent vitals at 02:50: T 38.5C, HR 78,
RR 22, BP 167/79, SpO2 93%. Latest labs: Hgb 9.7g/dL (N), Troponin 0.11ng/mL (H). Pending: CT chest read;
blood cultures still pending. Allergies: NKDA. Code status: Full Code. Tasks for next shift: Follow up CT
chest result when available; Assess pain and give PRN opioid if >6/10; Confirm code status with
patient/family. Risks to watch: Arrhythmia risk with hypoxia, Respiratory decompensation.

Maria Chen in 3E-12, 62 y/o with Stage IIIB non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), on chemoradiation. Currently
on Levetiracetam (500 mg PO BID) and Enoxaparin (40 mg SQ daily). Most recent vitals at 03:00: T 38.2C, HR
107, RR 17, BP 149/74, SpO2 96%. Latest labs: Na 136.3mmol/L (H), WBC 5.1K/uL (N). Pending: CT chest read;
blood cultures still pending. Allergies: NKDA. Code status: Full Code. Tasks for next shift: Call RT for
breathing treatment if wheezing; Hold anticoagulation if hemoptysis worsens; Monitor chest tube output and
dressing. Risks to watch: Delirium/falls risk, Arrhythmia risk with hypoxia.

Maria Chen in 3E-12, 62 y/o with Stage IIIB non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), on chemoradiation. Currently
